Expense Description: Four copies of Law of Education Issue 138 for the Department for Education legal library.
Purchase of licence for software iThink 10.1 non-educators edition to perform systems dynamics analysis used to model future academy numbers.
Membership fees for the Schools Interoperability Framework (SIF) from October 2015 to March 2016. SIF promote effective management of learning information.
Purchase of specialist equipment as a reasonable adjustment for one DfE official.
Online training courses for communicating effectively and collaborating/partnering for one DfE official.
